StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetImportPersonByImportEventId]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ImportEventId uniqueidentifier, @ImportPersonStatusTypeId smallint = 0 AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
IF @ImportPersonStatusTypeId = 0
BEGIN
SELECT *
FROM [usmc].[ImportPerson] IP
WHERE IP.ImportEventId=@ImportEventId END
ELSE
BEGIN
SELECT *
FROM [usmc].[ImportPerson] IP
WHERE IP.ImportEventId=@ImportEventId AND IP.ImportPersonStatusTypeId=@ImportPersonStatusTypeId END
END
